mainText:
I love art. I love physics. I applied to college today, and 12 months ago
freaked out because I had no idea what to do with my life. Because of Steve
Jobs and John Ives, I am going to Carnegie Mellon for industrial design. I
want to thank them so much, more than can be expressed in an email.

‎"The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found
it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle. As with all matters of the heart, you’ll
know when you find it. And, like any great relationship, it just gets better
and better as the years roll on. So keep looking until you find it. Don’t
settle."
author: Karyn
